relatedBlades.title: VPN Replacement
relatedBlades.subtitle: Replace overburdened VPNs with Zero Trust access
relatedBlades.copy: Surging remote work has put strain on VPNs. Learn how Zero Trust access offers a more modern, scalable approach to securing corporate apps.

imageAssetFile.altText: VPN Replacement - three users with security shield
imageAssetFile.title: VPN Replacement - Hero

relatedBlades.copy1: VPNs are increasingly the target of attacks and increasingly vulnerable to painful breaches.
relatedBlades.copy2: Bad actors with VPN credentials have the "keys to the kingdom" to go anywhere and take anything.
relatedBlades.copy3: VPNs can be frustrating for administrators to configure, and clunky for users to handle.

relatedBlades.bladeName: VPN Replacement - Positioning and Benefits - Title
relatedBlades.header1: Replace your VPN with our massive global network
relatedBlades.copy2: Cloudflare Zero Trust enables identity-aware, least privilege access to any corporate resource for any user, regardless of device or location.

features.title: Strengthen your security posture
features.description: Adopt [Zero Trust security](https://www.cloudflare.com/learning/security/glossary/what-is-zero-trust/) best practices and reduce the risk of costly breaches.

features.title: Deliver a better user experience
features.description: Deprecate your VPN usage and deliver a more seamless, low-latency access way for your users to interact with your apps.

features.title: Level up your access strategy
features.description: Empower your admins with comprehensive visibility and granular controls to determine who should interact with your internal tools.

relatedBlades.quote: "When Peter Hahn transitioned to working remotely, we found that our VPN was causing serious performance issues. Deploying Cloudflare Access in front of the first batch of our internal tools resulted in such a huge increase in performance, reliability and convenience for the whole team that we are gradually transitioning all tools to use Access as soon as possible. Getting started took us only a few minutes."

relatedBlades.title: Authenticate users with a consistent, SaaS-like login flow
relatedBlades.copy: Setting up VPN clients is tedious. Access integrates with multiple identity providers, enabling your users, whether internal employees or external partners, to authenticate seamlessly with a familiar login flow.

imageAssetFile.altText: Screenshot of Cloudflare for Teams dashboard on identity providers screen.
imageAssetFile.title: VPN Replacement - Multiple Identity Provider

relatedBlades.title: Minimize implicit trust
relatedBlades.copy: Cloudflare Access removes implicit trust given to network 'insiders' by authenticating each request based on user identity and contextual factors before granting access.

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare for Teams - VPN replacement - edit rule
imageAssetFile.title: VPN Replacement - Minimize Implicit Trust

relatedBlades.title: Intuitive policy controls
relatedBlades.copy: VPNs are black boxes: they lack the dynamic controls needed to manage access for remote workers, contractors, supply chain partners and more. Cloudflare Access delivers better flexibility with application-specific controls and easy-to-use rules.

imageAssetFile.altText: VPN Replacement - Intuitive Policy Controls - configuring login methods
imageAssetFile.title: VPN Replacement - Intuitive Policy Controls

relatedBlades.quote: "POLITICO needed a way to control access to specific critical resources without the risk and overhead of connecting through a private corporate network. Cloudflare Access aligns with how and where our team works, while helping us embrace a Zero Trust security model, where every request to every app is evaluated for user identity - and no VPN is required."
relatedBlades.quoteTitle: Senior Director, Technology Operations and Cybersecurity

features.title: Blog: Cloudflare's own journey replacing its VPN
features.description: Cloudflare first built Access because our engineers were fed up with their VPN experience. Read about our journey to replace our own VPN.

features.title: Considering VPN replacement? Compare 3 remote access approaches
features.description: Yes, you really can replace your VPN with Zero Trust Network Access. Download this technical whitepaper to compare alternative remote access approaches and find the best option for your organization.

imageAssetFile.altText: Thumbnail - Cloudflare One Resources - SASE Whitepaper
imageAssetFile.title: Thumbnail - Cloudflare One Resources - SASE Whitepaper

relatedBlades.title: Start Now
relatedBlades.copy: Secure access to your corporate applications without a VPN. Getting started with Access takes minutes. With our free plan, your first 50 users are free.
